original_text: “The seed will grow well, the vine will yield its fruit, the ground will produce its crops, and the heavens will drop their dew. I will give all these things as an inheritance to the remnant of this people.
korean_text: 곧 평강의 씨앗을 얻을 것이라 포도나무가 열매를 맺으며 땅이 산물을 내며 하늘은 이슬을 내리리니 내가 이 남은 백성으로 이 모든 것을 누리게 하리라

sentences.original_text: the vine will yield its fruit
the ground will produce its crops
the heavens will drop their dew
I will give all these things
as an inheritance to the remnant of this people
sentences.korean_translation: 이 백성의 남은 자에게 기업으로 주리라
